text: Geeta Tandon is an Indian stunt performer. She became known after appearing in season 5 of Fear Factor: Khatron Ke Khiladi. She has been called "one of Bollywood's leading stuntwomen." ==Biography== Tandon was born in Mumbai in a Punjabi family and raised in very harsh environment. She lost her parents at very early age. She was married off at age of 15 and gave birth to two children. ==Career== Tandon completed her matriculation studies and started her career as a dancer. She was offered work as stunt woman due to her attitude. She performed stunts for actors such as Deepika Padukone, Parineeti Chopra, Katrina Kaif and Bipasha Basu in films such as Chennai Express, Hasee Toh Phasee, Ragini MMS, Singh Saab The Great and Lamhaa. ==Fear Factor: Khatron Ke Khiladi== Tandon became famous after she appeared on the show Fear Factor: Khatron Ke Khiladi. Tandon stated that she never faced a camera before during her career. ==References== Category:Living people Category:1975 births Category:Television personalities Category:Stunt performers
